mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id,a.content,a.type,b.username FROM jinju_db.jinju a,jinju_db.jj_user b WHERE a.user_id = b.user_id LIMIT #{m},#{n};

SELECT j.jinju_id, j.content, j.type, j.up_vote_count, j.down_vote_count, l.type AS up_or_down_vote, j.collect_count, c.collect as is_collect, j.update_time, u.user_id, u.username FROM jinju j LEFT JOIN jj_user u ON j.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN jj_vote l ON j.jinju_id = l.jinju_id AND l.user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN jj_collect c ON j.jinju_id = c.jinju_id AND c.user_id = #{userId}
LIMIT #{m},#{n}

SELECT j.jinju_id, j.content, j.type, j.up_vote_count, j.down_vote_count, j.collect_count, j.update_time FROM jinju j
LIMIT #{m},#{n}
